mapper.select: SELECT deal_user.deal_user_id, deal_user.deal_user_name, deal_user.phone, deal_user.type, deal_user.integral, deal_user.create_time FROM deal_user AS deal_user WHERE deal_user.deal_user_id = #{dealUserId}
SELECT deal_user_id, deal_user_name FROM deal_user WHERE status = #{status}

SELECT deal_user_store.deal_store_id, deal_user.deal_user_id, deal_user.deal_user_name FROM deal_user AS deal_user JOIN deal_user_store AS deal_user_store ON deal_user.deal_user_id = deal_user_store.deal_user_id WHERE deal_user_store.examine = #{examine} AND deal_user.type = #{type}
